articles.author: David Hayward
articles.title: Victorian budget: Soaring debt and deficit, but no need to panic - The Age
articles.description: At times like these, it's far better for the government to balance the economy, rather than the budget.
articles.content: The budget deficit will be as much as $26 billion, compared to a surplus of $1 billion in 2018-19. That is a massive injection of cash in any language. State debt will soar, climbing from $22 billion… [+3270 chars]
